809190.name: The Long Reach Demo
809190.description:
In the weeks before Christmas Calvin's in trouble. His career-girlfriend, Shelly, has giving him an ultimatum, shape up or the wedding's off! Beginning today, Calvin must drop his lazy attitude. Starting with a trip to Simon's Corner to pick up the groceries, Calvin's life's about to take a major turn for the worse.

At its heart The Long Reach is an adventure game. Closer inspection also reveals it’s a thrilling horror story, flavoured with sci-fi ideology, psychological context and a skeptical view on the human psyche.
